title: Music Player
description: Built using React and Sass. A responsive music player that highlights the tune playing in the library and changes images for each tune. This was completed as part of The Creative React and Redux Course by DevEd

title: Cross Connect
description: Built using vanilla JS, HTML and CSS to keep data requirements smaller. I designed and built this site with close consultation with the client. I am continuing to advise them on improving their copy and developing service targetted landing pages.

title: Artists Portfolio
description: My first ever website was this portfolio site to allow my father to show off his amazing art work. It features a responsive design, full screen image enlargements and utilises Netlify form control.
